name: Koffie Van Brunt
instructions:
1. Fill a 12-ounce heat-proof mug halfway with boiling water.
2. Drop a small mixing tin directly into the water to create a double boiler effect.
3. Add the rum, Cherry Heering and simple syrup into the tin and let sit while preparing a shot of espresso.
4. Once the espresso is ready, pour the hot water out of the mug and pour the contents of the tin directly into the mug.
5. Add five ounces of hot water and top with the espresso shot.
6. Shake two ounces of cream in a cocktail shaker until thick but pourable and carefully pour on top of the drink.
7. Garnish with grated orange zest and cinnamon.
description: This hot, rum-based cocktail recipe reads like an unorthodox twist on an Irish Coffee. The drink is topped with a cream float.

ingredients.name: Dark Rum
ingredients.description: Dark rum is a type of rum that is aged longer and often in charred barrels, giving it a darker color and a richer, more robust flavor compared to lighter rums. It typically has notes of caramel, molasses, and sometimes spices. Dark rum is commonly used in cocktails, especially those with a strong, flavorful profile, and it is also enjoyed neat or on the rocks. The aging process contributes to the development of complex flavors and a smoother texture.

ingredients.name: Cherry heering
ingredients.description: Cherry Heering is a Danish cherry-flavored liqueur with a deep red color. It is made from a base of spirits, sugar, and cherries, specifically sour cherries, which contribute to its rich and sweet flavor profile. Cherry Heering is known for its versatility in cocktails and is often used in classic and modern mixology. One of the most famous cocktails featuring Cherry Heering is the Singapore Sling. The liqueur has a distinct cherry taste with hints of almond and spices, making it a popular choice for adding depth and complexity to a variety of drinks.

ingredients.name: Simple Syrup
ingredients.description: Syrup made with sugar and water. Usually in 1:1 or 2:1 ratio.

ingredients.name: Espresso
ingredients.description: Espresso is generally thicker than coffee brewed by other methods, with a viscosity similar to that of warm honey.

ingredients.name: Cream
ingredients.description: Cream is a dairy product composed of the higher-fat layer skimmed from the top of milk before homogenization.
